headline: Nordson Corporation Names Maria Spangler as Director, Nordson Foundation and Community Relations
summary: WESTLAKE, Ohio, November 19, 2024--Nordson Corporation (NASDAQ: NDSN) today announced that Maria Spangler has been named director, Nordson Foundation and Community Relations, effective Dec. 2, 2024. Ms. Spangler succeeds Cecilia Render, who announced her upcoming retirement effective Dec. 31, 2024. In the overlapping time, Ms. Spangler will partner with Ms. Render to ensure a smooth transition.
